USERDATA.NEWCOMER_INFO: You are currently a newcomer in {groupName} and you can become active by writing messages, meeting fellow members, doing activities and giving feedback. As soon as {threshold} members expressed their trust in you, you will gain editing permissions to help with group administration.

daily_activity_notification.NAME: Activity notifications
daily_activity_notification.DESCRIPTION: Reminds you of your activities, and tells you about empty or not-full activities of your favorite places in the next day

STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE: How many weeks in advance should recurring activities be shown?
STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE_WARNING: Existing leftover activities will get deleted if they are empty. You can disable non-empty activities manually, if needed.

SUBSCRIPTION.YES_TEXT: Shows available activities on the group wall and sends emails about upcoming activities.
SUBSCRIPTION.NO_TEXT: None of the above. You can still sign up for activities though.

ACTIVITYMANAGE.TITLE: Manage activities
ACTIVITYMANAGE.ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_MATCH: This activities' date doesn't match the recurrence pattern

ACTIVITYDELETE.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: Do you really want to delete this recurring activity? This will also delete all one-time activity dates that belong to this recurring activity (except where people joined already).

CREATEACTIVITY.WEEKDAYS_HELPER: On which days should the activity take place?
CREATEACTIVITY.TIME_HELPER: When should the activity take place?
CREATEACTIVITY.DATE_HELPER: When should the activity take place?
CREATEACTIVITY.MAX_PARTICIPANTS_HELPER: How many people should participate in the activity?
CREATEACTIVITY.COMMENT_HELPER: What should people know when signing up to this activity?
CREATEACTIVITY.ENABLE_DISABLE_MESSAGE: Users who joined this activity will get a notification. You can change this text to provide a reason:
CREATEACTIVITY.EXCEPTIONS_MESSAGE: Some upcoming activities don't match the settings of this recurring activity. Have a look below at '{upcomingLabel}' to change or disable activities, if needed.

ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE: There is one activity in your favorite places waiting for you! | There are {count} activities in your favorite places waiting for you!
ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE_FEEDBACK: You can give feedback to an activity | {count} activities await your feedback
ACTIVITYLIST.JOINEDNOTICE: You have one upcoming activity | You have {count} upcoming activities
ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE_FROM_STORES: This shows activities from your favorite places in the next days. You can access other places in the sidebar.

ITEM.JOIN_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you have time to participate on {date}?
ITEM.LEAVE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to leave this activity?

ACTIVITYLIST.NONE_HINT: You can create a new activity on the place page.
ACTIVITYLIST.STORE_NONE_HINT: You can create a new activity on the activity manage page.

FEEDBACKLIST.NO_DONE_ACTIVITIES_HINT: You currently have no activities to give feedback to. Why not join another activity?

ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.TOGETHER_WITH: You did this activity together with:

HISTORY.ACTIVITY_MODIFY: changed the settings of an activity
HISTORY.SERIES_MODIFY: changed the settings of a recurring activity
HISTORY.ACTIVITY_MISSED: Nobody came to an activity at {storeName}!
HISTORY.ACTIVITY_JOIN: signed up for an activity at {storeName}
HISTORY.ACTIVITY_LEAVE: stepped back from an activity at {storeName}

NOTIFICATION_BELLS.FEEDBACK_POSSIBLE: You can give feedback for the activity you did on {date}
NOTIFICATION_BELLS.ACTIVITY_UPCOMING: Reminder: You have an activity at {time}

AGREEMENT.BLURB2: If you add one then people will have to agree to it before they can participate in activities.

REPLACE.MESSAGE: Everyone will have to agree again before they can signup for activities

REMOVE.MESSAGE: This means anyone will be able to do an activity
